product_name: I Dew CareStarlit Kitten Brightening Hydrogel Eye Patch
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingI Dew Care Starlit Kitten Brightening Hydrogel Eye Patch is infused with jewel powder and hydrogel to detox and depuff the eyes and caffeine for a wide-awake, luminous look.
details: DetailsBenefitsDepuffs eyesProvides hydrationHelps re-energize tired under eyes by providing active ingredientsFeaturesFragrance with sweet citrus to enjoy while doing care of your skinKey IngredientsJewel Powder(Sapphire & Jade Powder, Amethyst Extract): helps de-tox and de-puff the appearance of dark circlesNiacinamide: helps reduce the look of fine lines and wrinklesHyaluronic Acid: delivers moisturizing and firming ingredientsCaffeine: improves micro-circulation for a brighter tone and reduces puffinessItem 2605292How To UsePlace 1 Pair of gels onto clean, dry under eye area for 15 minutes (or longer if desired).Discard after use and massage remaining serum into skin. No need to rinse your face.Gently pat remaining serum on targeted under eye area.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Erythritol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Panthenol, Cellulose Gum, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Caprylyl Glycol, Algin, Potassium Chloride, Titanium Dioxide(Ci 77891), Sucrose, Silica, Dextrin, Caffeine, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Mica, Pantolactone, Indigofera Tinctoria Leaf Extract, Tin Oxide, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Benzyl Glycol, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Diamond Powder, Nephrite Powder, Sapphire Powder, Amethyst Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Platinum Powder, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Disodium Edta, Fragrance.
how_to_use: Place 1 Pair of gels onto clean, dry under eye area for 15 minutes (or longer if desired).Discard after use and massage remaining serum into skin. No need to rinse your face.Gently pat remaining serum on targeted under eye area.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy it again
reviews.comments: Feels night for under eyes mask

reviews.headline: i love it
reviews.comments: it makes my under eyes look so hydrated

reviews.headline: Mehhhhhâ€¦
reviews.comments: I bought this in store, and I tried them for the first time today. Keep in mind i have combination skin, if that makes any difference. They felt super drying on my face. There was a good amount of serem but it didnt feel hydrating at all. My skin felt like it was burning too. And the burning feeling went on for about 30-40 minutes after i removed the patches. Another thing is I didnt notice much of a difference to my dark circles or puffiness. I noticed the tinest difference, but there are definetly better eye patches ive used that made a world of a difference.

reviews.headline: My review
reviews.comments: the best product on the market, already went and bought extras for when i run out. i love love love these eye patches and i can never switch to another brand again after this. these eye patches not only help with dark circles but helped my eczema.  complimentary from i dew care

reviews.headline: I wish I could return these
reviews.comments: As cute as these are, there was absolutely no serum in any of them. I checked the expiration date which is in 2025 so it wasnt an expiration issue. I'm honestly surprised this got so many good reviews. The packaging is cute sure but I'm not going to buy an eye product that doesn't work. I did try them bone dry just to see if they did anything but they didn't. Do not buy!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I've tried this product twice so far I love the texture! The packaging is glittery and super cute. It has an amazing smell as well. I will keep using the rest of the package to see better results. I have a very dark under eye so I'm confident the patches will help :) gifted by I dew care

reviews.headline: Love these!!
reviews.comments: I sew care gifted me these under eye patches! These are perfect for my under eyes. These are super cooling on your face and have helped fade and brighten my dark under eyes. These patches make you look awake and like you had an extra cup of coffee!

reviews.headline: So hydrating
reviews.comments: So hydrating for the under eyes. I've used these probably 4x in the past month and noticed a visible difference in my under eyes each time. For reference I have fairly fry under eyes. I love how cooling these feel as well. Gifted by I Dew Care

reviews.headline: Essential. I would buy again and again!
reviews.comments: I am obsessed at how cute these eye patches are! Not only that, I love adding them in my selfcare routines. I think these patches help revitalize my tired eyes. I definitely recommend checking them out! Idk what it is but I am just obsessed with products from I Dew Care. This one is on my top faves! *Gifted by I Dew Care but all opinions are my own.

reviews.headline: Good for what it is
reviews.comments: I was gifted by I Dew Care in exchange for my honest review. The masks feel like jelly and stay on without sliding around. The serum feels nice without feeling sticky. However, I personally didn't notice a difference using them. They'd make a great gift for a kid or teenager

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Gifted by I Dew Care. I've never tried this brand and I was missing out!! I love these patches so much. First of all, they are so cute and sparkly and the packaging is adorable. Secondly, it leaves my under eyes nice and hydrated but not greasy and oily. Love this!

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: This eye patch was so easy apply and did not slip off my face. it helped brighten my under eyes and overall made my skin feel a lot softer and hydrated. Perfect for sensitive skin types. Gifted by I Dew Care.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: Love this product! I've never used under eye patches before but these were great for a night of selfcare. I do wish the packaging wasn't as wasteful though. But otherwise I loved the products especially the holographic look! Gifted by i dew care

reviews.headline: Great for relaxing
reviews.comments: I love using eye masks to use when relaxing in the evening and have time for reading. These were great, however I definitely noticed less product on the patches compared to others I've used from other brands. It helped to keep them from sliding down the face but would have liked a little more product to soak in during the 30 recommended minutes. Gifted by I Dew Care.

reviews.headline: So cute
reviews.comments: first of all These eye patches are adorable, the color is like a chrome and it's so cute. BUT, they are super hydrating, surprisingly. I've used them a few times and I love

reviews.headline: Loved these gel patches!
reviews.comments: I was gifted by I Dew Care in exchange for my honest review. I love the texture and feel, they are especially cooling after being refrigerated. They very faintly brighten up the area and provide some plumping affect. I wasn't a fan of the excess plastic in the packaging, but I would definitely use these gels again.

reviews.headline: Yes yes yes
reviews.comments: These are in the cutest packaging and they are so effective at the same time!!! Ugh I love I see care so much!! They never miss!!! It was so cooling on the eyes and refreshing!!! I will be repurchasing gifted by I dew care

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I loved this product! it's nice! I love the texture, I like how it looks and feels, I had very noticeable and tired dark circles under my eyes and this helped to alleviate a lot and also hydrated the area of â€‹â€‹my dark circles and the packaging is a plus! #giftedbyidewcare

reviews.headline: Love them!
reviews.comments: I received these eye patches as complimentary from I dew Care and  Love it! Packaging is cute ! Super effective and they feel amazing. I put these eyes patches in the fridge and it made more impact plus the cooling sensation felt AMMAAZZINNGG! Definitely recommend and price point is good as well.

reviews.headline: Love these eyepatches
reviews.comments: I am obsessed with eye patches so I was super excited to try these! I've never tired anything from this brand before but I actually really liked these. They left my eyes looking bright and less puffy. I love the ingredients too and how they're clean / vegan. The packaging is super cute and they go on really well and effortless. Perfect for a self care night. Gifted by I Dew Care

faceoff_positive.comments:
Hey Beauties! ðŸ’™ 

#IDewCareGiftedMe their incredible Starlit Kitten Brightening Hydrogel Eye Patch! 

These sparkling eye-brightening gel patches add dazzle and shine to your skincare routine! Its shimmering formula has a floral, powdery musk scent is infused with real jewel powder and hydrogel to depuff, and caffeine for a wide-awake, luminous look. 

Key Ingredients:
Jewel Powder (Sapphire & Jade Powder, Amethyst Extract)~ Helps de-puff the appearance of the under eye area, improve appearance of dark circles and provide luminosity to the area. 

Niacinamide~ Helps reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
Hyaluronic Acid~Â Helps moisturize and firm skin. 

Caffeine~ Helps improve microcirculation for brighter looking skin and reduced puffiness. 

These are simple and easy to use, justÂ place a pair of gels onto clean, dry under eye area for 30 minutes. Discard after use and massage remaining serum into skin. No need to rinse your face. Gently pat remaining serum on targeted under eye area. 

This product is Vegan and PETA CERTIFIED Animal Test Free! 

I'm absolutely in love with these fabulous eye hydrogel patches. They're so quick and easy to apply to your under eyes. I found them to be so soothing and relaxing on my skin. My under eye area looked less puffy and brighter after using them. The ingredients are absolutely perfectly as I love Hyaluronic Acid,Â  Niacinamide and Caffeine. I always put products like this in the refrigerator for an extra cooling feeling. These are a great at home spa day time! 

Product Shown:
@IDewCare~ Starlit Kitten Brightening Hydrogel Eye Patch
faceoff_positive.headline: Relaxing Eye Patches

faceoff_negative.comments: These are decent but honestly I've used better eye masks. Really love the packaging and look of this product and it's good quality. The eye masks are perfect for a get ready with me or self care post because they are really holographic and glittery, super cute. The application process was super easy, just place under the eyes, remove after a specified amount of time, rub in excess. Unfortunately there wasn't any excess because the masks were kind of dry even tho they were in great packaging. Personally I prefer masks with more serum. I didn't notice much of a difference after use. Overall I enjoyed them but probably wouldn't purchase. Gifted by I Dew Care for my honest opinion.
faceoff_negative.headline: Cute packaging and look but not very effective
